title: Unconditionally With Me
description: After three years of dating Julian Rice, Elle Bruder has no active plans to move their relationship forward to the next level. Then again, he doesn’t either. And despite her frustration, she’s wary about asking Julian about it.Until a gift she inherits makes her realize she deserves more.Julian is stunned when he realizes this could change the plans he’s made —plans he’s not yet shared. But he knows he has a limited amount of time to close the distance between them.In the blink of an eye, they’re heading towards Seattle to look over Elle’s inheritance. And on their trip, they’ll find out if anything could unconditionally change the way they feel about each other.Could it?
author: Tracey Jerald
